title: Food-Delivery
description: This is a food delivery app project built to practice and learn modern web technologies, using TypeScript and JavaScript for its development, and designed to provide a convenient way for users to order food online.

title: Conference-Management-Syetem
description: This is a Conference Management System project built to practice and learn modern web technologies, using React for the frontend and Node.js with JavaScript for the backend.

title: Lap Galaxy
description: LapGalaxy is a real-world project developed for a client, providing a convenient platform to explore and purchase laptop products, using React, Spring Boot, and Tailwind
